author: benh
msg: Added a log line in master.

author: benh
msg: Added support for creating a Future out of a Promise.

author: benh
msg: More updates for the slaves manager. In particular, factored out the slaves manager into own header and implementation file.

author: benh
msg: Added an implementation of multimap that is quite a bit more user-friendly than the one in the STL. I'd prefer not to be duplicating/overriding data structures in the codebase, but the benefit that this version of multimap provides to code readability makes this case worthwhile.

author: benh
msg: Updates to libprocess, a few small bug fixes and factoring out the GarbageCollector process as well as adding 'run' functionality and adding tests.
